amendment.description: To improve section 1204, relating to the National Guard State Partnership Program.

action.text: Amendment SA 1474, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1474 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1474 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Coons to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S4263-4270, S4328; text: CR S4265-4266) To improve section 1204, relating to the National Guard State Partnership Program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1474 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Coons to Amendment SA 1463.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1474 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
